section.title: Verify the Database service installation
section.para: To verify that the Database service is installed and configured correctly, try executing a Trove command:

step.para: You should see output similar to this:

Assuming you have created an image for the type of database you want, and have updated the datastore to use that image, you can now create a Trove instance (database). To do this, use the trove create command.
This example shows you how to create a MySQL 5.5 database:

screen.userinput: trove create name 2 --size=2 --databases=dbname \ --users user:pass --datastore_version mysql-5.5 \ --datastore mysql
